html:
7.16.24  10:01 am   where is where the sun don't shine?

      for example, currently in Antarctica

7.16.24  8:11 am   in the video "Perfect." there is Chinese on the commercial signage fixture, can you speak Chinese?

      no

7.16.24  4:29 am   Thoughts on whale noises?

     i've never heard a whale make noise

     Follow up question: how often do you make whale noises

     never

7.16.24  3:32 am   how did you make the synth keys on where i've been 

      it's sometimes a lot of turning knobs until you get what you like, but also making sure that there is still one knob that you can actually turn while you're playing it. but even more importantly, it's how you play it in the song, and which one you choose to play what where

7.16.24  1:47 am   how do i accelerate

      continue applying more outward force in one direction

7.16.24  1:09 am   Which part of history that made you feel weirded out the most?

      the big bang

7.16.24  12:54 am   what's the last movie you watched,

     the adjustment bureau

     and did you like it?

     i can't tell you

7.16.24  12:42 am   Are you waiting for someone to ask a very specific question?

Can I ask it?

      yes, thank you, that was it

7.16.24  12:41 am   Do you skip/ignore questions sometimes and if so, how do you decide what to answer and what to skip? 

      i skip all of them. then i go back and answer all the ones that aren't about sponge bob

7.16.24  12:26 am   why are words called words?

      because that's what it sounds like when you say a word

7.16.24  12:15 am   what's the worst song ever made

      there has never been a bad song, although some people may hate some of them. usually the ones people hate are actually good

7.16.24  12:11 am   When it comes to bands or musical groups, do you prefer group names that are one word, or names that have multiple words? ex. "Primus" or "King gizzard and the lizard wizard"

      surprise me

7.15.24  10:49 pm   do you try to have fun on your birthday?

      not in any different way than any other day

7.15.24  10:47 pm   Are you working on something cool and new or just chilling? 

      hold on i'm doing my best work. i'm going to do all of it don't worry

7.15.24  9:53 pm   The Street Cleaner came by yesterday, was the street clean before that? I always seem to forget.

      i know the feeling

7.15.24  9:31 pm   was there a moment where suddenly you knew that you wanted to make music or did it sneak up on you

      those 2 options sound like the same thing, but it became obvious to me very early. perhaps before i learned to walk or talk

7.15.24  8:42 pm   speak a different language than english, will you do that?

      maybe some other time

7.15.24  7:56 pm   what is one existing genre of music you'd like to try out one day?

      good

7.15.24  7:36 pm   do you ever look and think wow that's hilarious

      yes

7.15.24  6:50 pm   i'm traveling to europe soon. what should i do / not do

      first you should figure out where europe is located. and then once you know that, what you should not do is go to a different location. hopefully these tips will help you on your quest

7.15.24  6:23 pm   thoughts on turtles?

      too fast

7.15.24  5:46 pm   How are you doing?

      pretty good

7.15.24  4:57 pm   did you see anything interesting today?

      i saw everything today

7.15.24  4:38 pm   what do you use to create visuals for your music videos? wanting to get into that myself as it looks fun

      you probably don't wanna do it my way, that would be just arguing with yourself for your whole life

7.15.24  4:31 pm   i want a divorce, bill.

      who is this

7.15.24  4:20 pm   How to make the best Chocolate Chip Cookies?

      take any average chocolate chip cookie and warm it up

7.15.24  11:26 am   It must be pretty bizarre, right?

      i have no idea what your talking about, but it most likely is bizarre

7.15.24  8:31 am   How can not being be?

      perhaps with being being on either side of it

7.15.24  7:52 am   do you think there's a universal truth or is it all just up to interpretation

      i'd say it's more like a universal infinite intricate network of inter-significantly connected interpretations

7.15.24  5:09 am   have you ever made a song with very obviously distinct sections that sound like individual songs, possibly with varying tempos? it's hard for me to phrase what i mean.

     actually i think saying 'tempo change' made it extremely easy to say what you mean

     (think "bohemian rhapsody", "sicko mode", "day in the life")

      it seems really hard to make tempo changes work in songs, without at least some padding dialogue or something. which really makes them 2 separate songs anyway

7.15.24  5:02 am   what's your favorite type of bird?

      surprise me

7.15.24  4:29 am   wondering about your preference:
machines create machines, or
create machines create

      the second one sounds slightly more fun

7.15.24  4:10 am   Has your view on street cleaners changed or is it still the same?

      they seem nice

7.15.24  3:16 am   are thoughts just justifications for feelings?

      it goes the other way too, where feelings are used to justify thoughts

7.15.24  2:11 am   Do you eat your vegetables?

      yes i do

7.15.24  12:40 am   I love your music and wonder, are there sounds and chords that you go back to a lot while writing new material? You seem to use a lot of sus2, add2, Isus2/3, i11/5... and do you have any specific favorites you might care to talk about? Thanks :)))

      i noticed at some point that i seem to deeply love the words "learn", and "change"

7.15.24  12:11 am   do you every just lose motivation to do anything? then randomly start thinking about the meaning of life, wondering if your purpose is to be doing the thing you're currently doing? or is that just me.

      that's normal

7.14.24  11:31 pm   how do i get a crisp drum recording sound with only one microphone, if that's even possible

      in your situation, try just using an iphone and maybe put a t-shirt over the hi hat

7.14.24  11:05 pm   Do you have any tips for blowing someone's mind?

      telling the truth might just do the trick. easier said than done, i'll admit

7.14.24  7:24 pm   how does one get motivation. Obviously doing something might motivate you to do it. But what if I'm not motivated to start doing that thing.

      in that case, then you probably don't have to do it

7.14.24  6:25 pm   in relation to question 7.13.24  10:41 am , would you like to go fishing?

      not right now

7.14.24  5:57 pm   Do you ever feel as if there are too many routes to take in terms of creating and find it difficult choosing?

     yes

     There are too many genres of music and art and instruments to learn one lifetime and I find it gives me a great deal of indecisiveness. Do you know how to decide?

     not exactly

7.14.24  4:11 pm   How much is too much? Also, how little is too little?

      an 'excess', and an 'insufficiency', respectively

7.14.24  3:04 pm   Is toast important?

      no, but that doesn't mean it's not good

7.14.24  1:10 pm   gravy on chips. yes or no?

      i've never seen it before

7.14.24  9:39 am   What are the two questions you haven't been asked?

      how's it going and how are you doing

7.14.24  9:19 am   Can you explain isomorphism??

      not quite

7.14.24  8:29 am   hoe gaat het leren van nederlands?

      valt best mee

7.14.24  8:23 am   so u speak dutch?

      not always, but sometimes i can't help it

7.14.24  7:41 am   are you the real you?

      let me perform some calculations
